slides.title: Presence Over Passwords
slides.subtitle: The Vitalization Manifesto
slides.body: Identity should be proved by who you are—your presence—not what you remember. PFF replaces the old world of passwords and fraud with hardware-bound, zero-knowledge proof.

slides.title: Three Layers of Truth
slides.subtitle: Phone. Finger. Face.
slides.body: Your device. Your biometrics. Your liveness. Together they create an unbreakable chain: the Presence Factor Fabric. No central vault of secrets. No single point of failure.

slides.title: 50/50 Doctrine
slides.subtitle: Citizen autonomy. National efficiency.
slides.body: Half the system serves you—your vault, your keys, your consent. The other half serves integrity—attestations, audits, no PII. Decoupled by design. Born in Lagos. Built for the World.

slides.title: The Living Record
slides.subtitle: Your data. Your presence. Your control.
slides.body: Medical and financial records, encrypted and stored with you at the centre. Decryption only when you prove presence—real-time, hardware-bound. The Heartbeat gates everything.

slides.title: Guardian Anchor
slides.subtitle: Sanctuary for the next generation.
slides.body: Sub-identities tethered to your PFF. Children protected by your presence. Permissions you set. Constraints you control. The fabric extends to those who depend on you.

slides.title: Born in Lagos
slides.subtitle: Built for the World.
slides.body: Where resilience is daily life. Low latency. Offline-first. Every device, every network. The Vitalization Manifesto started here—and scales everywhere.

comparison.beforeBody: Unverified identities. Fraud. No presence-based reality. The old world.
comparison.afterBody: Hardware-bound proof. Zero-knowledge. Presence-only. The future.

slides.title: You're Ready
slides.subtitle: Become a Vitalized Citizen.
slides.body: Prove your presence. Anchor your device. Join the fabric.
